chapter: Congenital malformations, deformations and chromosomal abnormalities
block: Congenital malformations and deformations of the musculoskeletal system
category: Congenital malformations of spine and bony thorax
title: Congenital scoliosis due to congenital bony malformation
inclusion: Hemivertebra fusion or failure of segmentation with scoliosis
exclusion: congenital musculoskeletal deformities of spine and chest
